'''Netotiliztli's Echoes''' is [[Xilonen]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If there are 5 characters in the party as a result of a character trial, and there are 4 {{Color|Pyro}}/{{Color|Hydro}}/{{Color|Cryo}}/{{Color|Electro}} characters besides Xilonen, neither effect will activate. However, the effects will activate as normal if there are 3 or less {{Color|Pyro}}/{{Color|Hydro}}/{{Color|Cryo}}/{{Color|Electro}} characters in the party.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*''{{w|Netotiliztli}}'' was a traditional dance of worship practiced by the {{w|Mexica}} people.
